p: For further studies using individual compounds, four of the major terpenes were selected from the L. alba EOs from both chemotypes, Citral (citral and (−) caryophyllene oxide) and Carvone (D (+) limonene and S (+) carvone). Table 5 presents the IC 50 values obtained on the three studied parasitic forms and the CC 50 values estimated on Vero cells.
